headline.main: VAST PARTISAN AID BACKS RED ARMY; Growing Strength of Guerrilla Activity Multiplies Perils That Beset Germans PLANES DELIVER SUPPLIES Secret Forces in Nazis' Midst Coordinate Work Closely With Military Units

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Feb. 28 - "We are like the stars in the sky -- no one can count us and no one can reach us." With these words a young, bearded partisan entered and leaned forward to warm his hands over the kerosene stove in the dugout. A dozen men lay wrapped in blankets on the earth floor, rifles at their sides.
